text: Shruti Sodhi is an Indian actress who works primarily in Telugu and Punjabi films.Shruti Sodhi to play a journalist in Kalyanram's film – Times of India. Timesofindia.indiatimes.com (1 November 2014). Retrieved on 2016-07-13.Jyotii Sethi to debut in Tollywood – Times of India. Timesofindia.indiatimes.com (9 January 2015). Retrieved on 2016-07-13. ==Career== Shruti Sodhi studied in New Delhi, and has a degree in philosophy.Shruti Sodhi has a degree in philosophy – Times of India. Timesofindia.indiatimes.com (21 January 2015). Retrieved on 2016-07-13. Shruti worked as a news anchor in two Hindi channels.Fashion Tips And Trends. Fashion.myntra.com. Retrieved on 13 July 2016.
